title: This was a pleasant stay
content: We enjoyed this very much! We enjoyed this very much! We enjoyed this very much! We enjoyed this very much! That's why I typed this four times.

title: I don't like this place at all
content: A horrible experience for us. It was raining through the roof on 2 days and we only stayed for one day. Exactly, read that again!
author: Ronny
